{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$3.4M in 2020-2021 on contracts with COADY CONSTRUCTION EXCAVATING.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}

{{< /details >}}
